footer.supportedPlatforms: Supports Fluent Emoji, Noto Emoji and System Emoji (displayed as system Unicode emoji on your device)
footer.description: Explore and download emojis from multiple design systems ‚Äî Apple, Google, Microsoft, and more, all in one place.

platformDescriptions.fluent: Explore Microsoft's Fluent Emoji ‚Äî a modern 3D emoji set designed for Windows and Microsoft products.
platformDescriptions.nato: Discover Google's Noto Emoji ‚Äî a flat, minimalist emoji set used across Android and Google platforms.
platformDescriptions.unicode: View emojis as they appear on your device. System Emoji are displayed using your platform's native Unicode rendering.

smartSearch.description: Search by keyword, meaning, or category in multiple languages.

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform Support
multiPlatform.description: Apple, Google, Microsoft Fluent Emojis ‚Äî all included.

noLogin.title: No Login Required
noLogin.description: Access everything instantly ‚Äî no signup hassle.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Emoji Directory. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we handle your information when you use our service.

infoWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoWeCollect.content: We collect minimal information to provide and improve our service:

items.browsing: Browsing data: Pages you visit, search queries, and emojis you interact with
items.device: Device information: Browser type, device type, and operating system
items.usage: Usage statistics: How you interact with our features

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the collected information to:

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: We store minimal data locally in your browser using cookies and local storage. We do not collect or store personal identifiable information on our servers. All emoji downloads are processed client-side or through secure CDN services.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services for:

items.cdn: Content Delivery Network (CDN) for emoji assets
items.analytics: Anonymous analytics to improve user experience

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to remember your preferences (like language selection and platform choice) and to provide a better user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not work properly.

items.access: Access the information we have about you
items.optout: Opt-out of data collection by clearing your browser data

childrens.title: Children's Privacy
childrens.content: Our service is intended for general audiences. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 years of age.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify users of any significant changes by updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through our GitHub repository or email us at privacy@emojidirectory.com.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Emoji Directory. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Emoji Directory, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, you should not access or use this service.

useOfService.title: Use of Service
useOfService.content: Emoji Directory provides a platform to explore, search, and download emoji graphics. You may use our service to:

items.download: Download emoji graphics for personal or commercial use (subject to respective emoji licenses)

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Emoji Directory website, its design, code, and original content are owned by Emoji Directory and protected by intellectual property laws. However, the emoji graphics themselves are sourced from various providers and are subject to their respective licenses.

emojiLicenses.title: Emoji Licenses
emojiLicenses.content: Different emoji collections on our platform have different licenses:

items.fluent: Licensed under MIT License by Microsoft
items.noto: Licensed under Apache License 2.0 and SIL Open Font License by Google
items.unicode: Platform-specific emojis are rendered by your operating system and are subject to the respective platform's terms

items.illegal: Use the service for any illegal purpose
items.harm: Attempt to harm, disrupt, or interfere with the service
items.misrepresent: Impersonate others or misrepresent your affiliation
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
items.scrape: Use automated tools to scrape or download content in bulk without permission

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Emoji Directory is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Emoji Directory shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms of Service.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Emoji Directory operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our GitHub repository or email us at hi@emojidir.com.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Read our latest articles and updates
blog.description: Explore articles about emojis, design, and more
